subject: The workers
sentence: The workers believe the company is fair.
paragraph: The company's new policy was recently announced. Some employees expressed approval. The workers believe the company is fair. Suggestions were made for further improvements. The management promised to consider them.

subject: The children
sentence: The children like the new playground.
paragraph: The city recently constructed a new playground. It was inaugurated with much fanfare. The children like the new playground. They play there every evening. Their laughter fills the park daily.

subject: The citizens
sentence: The citizens fear the consequences of pollution.
paragraph: Air quality has been declining in the city. Environmentalists have raised their concerns. The citizens fear the consequences of pollution. They are advocating for stricter regulations. Policy makers are taking their voices seriously.

subject: The painting
sentence: The painting resembles a famous masterpiece.
paragraph: The local art gallery opened a new exhibition. Among its pieces, a painting caught everyone's attention. The painting resembles a famous masterpiece. Experts debated its origins passionately. Visitors were left in awe.

subject: The garden
paragraph: Spring has brought life back to the garden. Flowers are blooming everywhere. The garden needs regular maintenance. Volunteers have been tending to it weekly. The community appreciates their effort.

subject: The expenses
sentence: The expenses total a significant amount.
paragraph: The renovation project's reports were shared. Initial estimates were surpassed. The expenses total a significant amount. Discussions on budget adjustments followed. New allocations will be proposed next week.

subject: The students
paragraph: The new teacher started classes last month. Her approach impressed everyone. The students respect their teacher. They eagerly participate in her lessons. Their performances have improved significantly.

subject: The travelers
sentence: The travelers miss their departure time.
paragraph: The train station was crowded with people. Confusion ensued due to delays. The travelers miss their departure time. They quickly rescheduled for the next available trip. Patience was their best companion through the ordeal.

subject: The stakeholders
sentence: The stakeholders trust the company's vision.
paragraph: A shareholders' meeting was held recently. Plans for expansion were detailed. The stakeholders trust the company's vision. They supported the strategic direction presented. Confidence in future success is high.

subject: The assistant
sentence: The assistant understands the project requirements.
paragraph: Meeting sessions were held last week. Several roles were assigned to team members. The assistant understands the project requirements. She has begun preparing necessary documents. Initial reviews were positive.

subject: The committee
paragraph: The annual awards were approaching. Nominees were being finalized. The committee recognizes her achievements. Discussions were animated and in great detail. Recognition seemed inevitable.

subject: The participants
sentence: The participants receive the welcome kit.
paragraph: The conference was about to begin. Attendees formed a line at the entrance. The participants receive the welcome kit. They appreciated the thoughtful gesture. This set a positive tone for the event.

subject: The audience
object: the subtle changes in the scenery
sentence: The audience notices the subtle changes in the scenery.
paragraph: The theater was packed for the show. Enthusiasts awaited the performance eagerly. The audience notices the subtle changes in the scenery. Applause followed each act. The production was skillfully executed.

subject: The hikers
sentence: The hikers hear the rustling leaves.
paragraph: Morning light filtered through the trees. The forest was tranquil and inviting. The hikers hear the rustling leaves. Nature's melody accompanied them along the trail. It was a peaceful start to their adventure.

subject: The tourists
sentence: The tourists see the majestic waterfall.
paragraph: The trail led them to an unexpected vista. Mist from the cascade created rainbows. The tourists see the majestic waterfall. Cameras clicked as everyone captured the moment. Memories were created to last a lifetime.
